articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Unit 991 of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits 991 Unit of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, visited 991 Unit of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force to congratulate service personnel there on the Day of Airmen. The unit is honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment. 
					 He was greeted by the commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 Kim Jong Un extended warm congratulations to the service personnel of the unit on the Day of Airmen, shaking hands with all commanding officers one by one. 
					
					 He had a talk with the service personnel of the unit. 
					
					 Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to bolster up the air force of the DPRK into elite combat ranks, valuing and loving them more than any others and bestowing all sorts of benevolence upon them, he said. 
					
					 He said that the air force is the precious heritage of the revolution left by the Generalissimos and their exploits performed for building the air and anti-air force will always go down in the history of the Juche-oriented army building. 
					
					 The KPA is invincible and the socialist homeland is an impregnable fortress thanks to the air and anti-air force trained under the care of the Generalissimos, he added. 
					
					 He had a photo taken with the service personnel of the unit, expressing his expectation and belief that they would firmly stand guard over the socialist country advancing towards a final victory, keeping themselves fully ready to go into action. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Vice Marshal of KPA Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Kim Yong Chol, and Hwang Pyong So, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site.
					 He went round the Samjiyon Grand Monument.
					
					 He looked round the statue of President Kim Il Sung in the military uniform he wore in those historic days when he was advancing into the homeland and group of subsidiary theme sculptures portraying service personnel of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and people.
					
					 He said the Samjiyon Grand Monument whose erection was initiated and guided by leader Kim Jong Il is a heroic epic masterpiece as it makes a profound ideological and artistic representation of the exploits the President performed by leading the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory and the validity of the revolutionary cause of Juche, adding that it is marvelous and spectacular to see the big open-air museum.
					
					 The visit to the monument, a treasure of eternal value of the Korean revolution and a base for education in the revolutionary traditions, offers an opportunity to harden the determination and will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, he noted.
					
					 He highly praised the officials and employees in the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site for displaying their intense loyalty in taking care of the monument.
					
					 He dropped in at the lodging quarters for participants in study tour of the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					 He went round House No. 1 and restaurant for students and other places to acquaint himself with the service at the lodging quarters and arrangement of tour programs.
					
					 He took benevolent steps to better furnish the interior of the lodging quarters as befitting the base for the participants in the study tour as required by the new century.
					
					 He instructed the party and working people's organizations to intensify the education through the study tours of revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites so that the participants might deeply grasp the revolutionary ideas and undying exploits of the Generalissimos.
					
					 He stressed the need to scrupulously organize the study tours of the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites and successfully arrange periodic tours and other tours.
					
					 Study tours of the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites are an important work to be consistently conducted till the final victory in the revolution, he noted, expressing his expectation and belief that the officials in the relevant field would creditably perform their honorable missions and duties.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Kim Pyong Ho, Hong Yong Chil and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Work in Various Fields in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Work in Various Fields in Samjiyon County
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the work in different fields in Samjiyon County. 
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace. 
					
					 He went round the room devoted to its history, hobby group room for training vocalists, room for physics, room for study of automobiles and other places of the palace. 
					
					 The Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace is the palace for children whom Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il loved so much, he said, giving valuable instructions to display the portraits of smiling Generalissimos more brightly and with greater care. 
					
					 Winter comes earlier and lasts long in Samijyon and it is, therefore, necessary to keep the palace warm so that schoolchildren may conduct after-school activities without inconvenience in winter, he said, giving instructions to successfully ensure heating by introducing a geothermal heating system. 
					
					 At the gymnasium he stressed the need to ensure satisfactory lighting for night exercises and install better equipment for sports including basketball. 
					
					 The second leg of his guidance was the Pegaebong Noodle House. 
					
					 Going round several dinning rooms on the ground and first floors, he learnt in detail about environment inside and outside and service. 
					
					 He said the noodle house is associated with the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, adding that if it is to operate better, it is important to preserve its own local character and face, not copying other's, and take thorough measures for the supply of foodstuff like starch and meat. 
					
					 The third leg of his guidance was the Samjiyon Hall of Culture. 
					
					 He learned in detail about the hall management and cultural and emotional life of the people in the county and gave an instruction to steadily improve the management and operation of the hall. 
						
					
					 Then he went round the indoor hockey ground, outdoor skate park and ski course in the Sports Village in Mt. Paektu Area and underlined the need to update the village. 
					
					 He watched training of ski runners of the Sajabong Sports Team. 
					
					 Prior to the training, he met them and asked about how long they have learned skiing and examined their ski suits with keen attention. 
					
					 After going round Samjiyon County, he set forth important tasks to be implemented by the county. 
					
					 It is the firm determination of the party to make cheers for socialism and the Workers' Party of Korea heard from Samjiyon as it is the first township at the foot of Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution where the Korean revolution started, he said. 
					
					 He underscored the need for the national institutions and the province to sincerely assist the county and for the whole country to help it so that all its party members and other working people may firmly equip themselves with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and glorify the revolutionary traditions of the party.
					
					 He promised to come to the county again, saying the people of the county are always in his mind.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Kim Pyong Ho, Hong Yong Chil and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Arrest of U.S. Citizen for Hostile Acts in DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Arrest of U.S. Citizen for Hostile Acts in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released the following report on Saturday:
					 A relevant institution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently put in custody U.S. citizen Merrill Edward Newman who committed hostile acts against the DPRK after entering the country under the guise of a tourist. 
					
					 After entering the DPRK as a member of tourists' group in October he perpetrated acts of infringing upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and slandering its socialist system, quite contrary to the purpose of tour.
					
					 He also committed such crime as trying to look for spies and terrorists who conducted espionage and subversive activities against the DPRK in the area of Mt. Kuwol during the last Fatherland Liberation War as well as their families and descendants and connect them with the "Kuwol Partisan Comrades-in-Arms Association," an anti-DPRK plot-breeding organization of south Korea.
					
					 According to the results of the investigation, he was active as adviser of "Kuwol Unit" of the UN Korea 6th Partisan Regiment part of the Intelligence Bureau of the Command of the U.S. Forces in the Far East since early in 1953. He is a criminal as he masterminded espionage and subversive activities against the DPRK and in this course he was involved in killings of service personnel of the Korean People's Army and innocent civilians.
					
					 The investigation clearly proved Newman's hostile acts against the DPRK and they were backed by evidence. He admitted all his crimes and made an apology for them.

articles.title: Apology of U.S. Citizen for His Hostile Acts in DPRK
articles.content:
Apology of U.S. Citizen for His Hostile Acts in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The following is an apology U.S. citizen Merrill Newman presented to a relevant institution after his detention in the DPRK:
					 I am Merrill Newman living in California, USA. 
					
					 During the Korean War, I have been guilty of a long list of indelible crimes against DPRK government and Korean people as advisor of the Kuwol Unit of the UN Korea 6th Partisan Regiment part of the Intelligence Bureau of the Far East Command.
					
					 As I gave 300 people with barbarity gone to the South who had ill feelings toward the DPRK from Chodo military education and guerilla training they later did attack against the DPRK although the armistice was signed.
					
					 I also gave 200 soldiers under my command in Mt. Kuwol the task to harass the rear base such as collecting information on the movement and the arm equipment in KPA, attacking and destruction on the communication system, the rice storage, railroad and munitions train by dispatching the several elements to Hwanghae Province Area.
					
					 According to my order they collected information of the KPA and attacked the communication system and killed 3 innocent operators, delayed the munitions supply using explosives obtained from attacking the mine and they attacked the KPA and harassing operations of the rear base 10 times in the Hwanghae Province Area. 
					
					 They killed about 50 soldiers in the process of the operation. In the process of following tasks given by me I believe they would kill more innocent people. 
					
					 As I killed so many civilians and KPA soldiers and destroyed strategic objects in the DPRK during the Korean War, I committed indelible offensive acts against the DPRK government and Korean people. 
					
					 Although 60 years have gone by, I came to DPRK on the excuse of the tour as a member of 33 Tour Group from U.S. on October 17, 2013.
					
					 Shamelessly I had a plan to meet any surviving soldiers and pray for the souls of the dead soldiers in Kuwol Mt. during the Korean war.  Following the itinerary I asked my guide to help me look for the surviving soldiers and their families and descendents because it was too hard for me to do myself.
					
					 If I had the opportunity to visit Kuwol Mt. I was going to pray for the souls of dead soldiers. If I saw surviving soldiers in Mt. Kuwol, I was going to connect them with the members of the Kuwol Partisan Comrades-in-Arms Association which I had already connected with, anti-Communist strategic plot organization. 
					
					 All the members of the Kuwol Partisan Comrades-in-Arms Association escaped from the DPRK to South Korea. So I asked the guide to help me to look for their families and relatives living in DPRK and I gave the document written with their address and e-mail address to the guide in the Yanggakdo Hotel.
					
					 I also brought the e-book criticizing the Socialist DPRK on this trip and criticizing DPRK.
					
					 Although I committed the indelible offensive acts against the Korean people in the period of the Korean War, I have been guilty of big crimes against the DPRK government and Korean People again.
					
					 I realize that I cannot be forgiven for my offensives but I beg for pardon on my knees by apologizing for my offensives sincerely toward the DPRK government and the Korean people and I want not punish me.
					
					 Please forgive me. 
					
					 I will never commit the offensive act against the DPRK Government and the Korean People again.
					
					 On this trip I can understand that in US and western countries there is misleading information and propaganda about DPRK. 
					
					 If I go back to USA, I will tell the true features of the DPRK and the life the Korean people are leading. 
					
					 Merrill Newman
					
					 Nov 9, 2013

articles.title: RBCK Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Suppressing Religionists
articles.content:
RBCK Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Suppressing Religionists
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Religious Believers Council of Korea (RBCK) in a statement released on Friday said that the south Korean conservative group is frantically resorting to modern day witch-hunt by branding even the mass on the situation conducted by the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice as the one "following the north" but this campaign cannot be a cure-all for tiding over the worst ruling crisis.
					 The statement denounced the "yusin" group for kicking up a whirlwind of fascist suppression by deliberately linking with the DPRK the just demand and righteous struggle of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 It is a fact recognized by all south Koreans irrespective of men and women, young and old that "the presidential election" last year was evidently a fraudulent election conducted with all power organs involved. Consequently, people's candlelight rallies protesting against the Park Geun Hye regime have gained in scope and strength over the past six months.
					
					 Only a tiny handful of ruling quarters such as "Chongwadae" and "the Saenuri Party" lend no ear to this strong public protest in south Korea.
					
					 It is quite natural for the religionists to condemn the social evils as they have always stood for the justice of the popular masses.
					
					 Even under the grim situation that prevailed in the 1970s when south Korea was under the worst "yusin" fascist dictatorial rule, churches were venues of actions to democratize the society and the priests of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice and other religionists in south Korea unhesitatingly joined in the dynamic struggle against the dictatorship.
					
					 The south Korean religionists' tradition of struggle is given continuity and it is supported by fair-minded people of broad strata even at present when the "yusin" dictatorship is reviving. 
					
					 Only the public stern judgment and punishment await devils hell-bent on prolonging their remaining days by blocking social progress, challenging the public and resorting to injustice.
					
					 We will extend positive support and solidarity to the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice and other religious organizations and believers in their just and righteous struggle as religionists of the same blood.
					
					 The RBCK is sure that the religious institutions and organizations and religionists all over the world will send full support and solidarity to the religionists in south Korea in their struggle against injustice.

articles.title: Delegation of International Affairs Institute Leaves for Britain
articles.content:
Delegation of International Affairs Institute Leaves for Britain
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Affairs Institute headed by its Vice-Director Kim Ul Ho left here Saturday to visit Britain.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Clarifies Principled Stand on U.S. Electronic Espionage
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Clarifies Principled Stand on U.S. Electronic Espionage
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegate made a speech at a meeting of the Third Committee of the 68th UN General Assembly on Nov. 26 in support of the resolution "right to private life in IT era" proposed by Brazil and Germany to cope with the U.S. illegal eavesdropping.
					 Noting the resolution was timely tabled at the international meeting, he said the global electronic espionage operation underway by a specified country is having great impact on everyone for its serious nature and gravity. The resolution reflects the opinion of the world community, he added.
					
					 As regards it, he suggested principled matters as follows:
					
					First, acts violating the principle of respect for others' sovereignty and interfering in others' internal affairs should no longer be allowed in international relations.
					
					 Illegal tapping and eavesdropping targeting heads of state is an unbearable insult to the dignity of states and a wanton violation of the UN Charter as it is an infringement upon their sovereignty and intervention in the internal affairs of sovereign states.
					
					 Such electronic espionage by the U.S. should be terminated at once. 
					
					If not, it will become impossible to protect and promote human rights in the true sense of words nor will it be possible to ensure relations based on trust and cooperation among countries and global peace and security.
					
					 Second, right to private life should be thoroughly protected.
					
					The electronic spying act perpetrated by the U.S. indicates that it is the worst human rights abuser who does not abide by even elementary norms of human rights.
					
					 Washington should immediately stop its indiscriminate human rights abuses at home and abroad before finding fault with the human rights performance in other countries, and set right its dirty human rights records.
					
					 Finally, the delegate stressed the DPRK has become a cosponsor country of the above-said resolution, underlining the need to take an effective measure to put an end to the U.S. human rights violation.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Various Counties
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Smiling Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Various Counties
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting smiling peerlessly great men Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" and "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" were erected in various counties.
					 They included Koksan and Suan counties in North Hwanghae Province, Songwon and Jonchon counties in Jagang Province and Kimhwa County in Kangwon Province.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il personally guided the work in Koksan and Suan counties on the spot, clearly indicating the road to be followed by the counties.
					
					 Songwon, Jonchon and Kimhwa Counties are associated with the exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by giving devoted and wise guidance to the counties in the work for developing local economy and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The mosaics reflect the ever-growing ardent yearning and boundless reverence of officials and workers in those counties for the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 A mosaic was also erected at the Chollima Steel Complex.
					
					It depicts Kim Il Sung arousing the workers of the then Kangson Steel Works to increase the steel production, saying the it would be good for the country if it has 10 000 tons of rolled steel in addition when visiting the works in the post-war period.
					
					 Officials and workers in the Chonam Stockbreeding Co-op Farm in Phyonggang County, Kangwon Province devoted themselves to erecting the mosaic "'Leader! It is the forefront'" at the highest level with a single mind to glorify long the undying exploits the President performed by leading the war to victory.
					
					 A mosaic "The great country" depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il foreseeing the immensely rosy future of the Juche revolution on Mt. Paektu, a sacred mountain of revolution, was erected at Namgang Workers' District in Kangdong County in Pyongyang.

articles.title: New People's Park and Folk Garden Built in Jagang Province
articles.content:
New People's Park and Folk Garden Built in Jagang Province
 Kanggye, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Jangjagang People's Pleasure Park and the Inphung Folk Garden were newly built in Jagang Province.
					 The pleasure park on the bank of the Jangja River in Kanggye City has courts for volleyball, basketball, tennis, small-size football and badminton and roller skating ground as well as site of sporting equipment, playing site, resting place, soft drink stand, flower counter and others.
					
					 Miniatures of monumental structures and historical and cultural relics of the country have been arranged in the folk garden.
					
					 Famous mountains of Korea have taken vivid shapes, animal sculptures were wonderfully created and road leading to the garden built to suit its features.
					
					 The creation of the park and garden will make contribution to the massive sports activities of people including school youth and children and to raising the level of their cultural knowledge.

articles.title: Construction of Chongchongang Cascade Power Stations Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Construction of Chongchongang Power Stations Progresses Apace
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The construction of Chongchongang cascade power stations is progressing apace.
					 This month builders increased the concrete tamping 1.9 times as over last month.
					
					 The builders have pushed forward with the concrete tamping of the dam on the right bank of Huichon Power Station No. 9.
					
					 They applied a rational method as the pillars of the sluice gate went up and registered the peak record in concrete tamping of pillars of the sluice gate by setting up a new system of carrying mixture.
					
					 The builders of Huichon Power Station No. 6 created dykes at each interval and carried out draining work, thus fulfilling daily quota of ground concrete tamping more than 2 times. 
					
					 At the construction site of Huichon Power Station No. 8 ground digging and concrete placing have been done in a short span of time for building fishway reinforcement structure extending dozens of meters.
					
					 The workers of the Thaechon Hydroelectric Power Station Construction Company who are in charge of the construction of Huichon Power Station No. 12 produced large steel framework and applied it to the construction to ensure the quality. They also made successes in the concrete tamping of intake floodgate pillars and walls of inlet channels.

articles.title: Ice Hockey Matches for DPRK Championships Close
articles.content:
Ice Hockey Matches for DPRK Championships Close
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The ice hockey matches for the DPRK Championships closed on Saturday. 
					 Four teams (men's and women's) which won in the first league matches competed in the second league matches to decide final standings.
					
					 In the men's event the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team came first and the Taesongsan Sports Team and the Ministry of Fisheries Sports Team second and third.
					
					 In the women's event the Taesongsan Sports Team took the first place and Kanggye University of Education No. 1 Sports Team and the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex Sports Team second and third places.
					
					 The ice hockey matches that started in the Ice Rink on November 14 were the final event of the championships.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls S. Korea Tundra of Human Rights
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls S. Korea Tundra of Human Rights
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime has become draconic in its anti-DPRK conspiratorial racket, getting increasingly vocal about the "human rights in the north". This is a vicious politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and a revelation of the despicable ulterior design sought by the regime to realize its vaulting ambition to escalate confrontation between social systems. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a commentary.
					 Such move is also prompted by its ulterior purpose to justify its confrontational moves and create international atmosphere for stifling the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet regime turned south Korea into the worst tundra of human rights in the world and has desperately worked to do harm to compatriots in the north. It is just the kingpin of human rights violation with no right to talk about human rights.
					
					 Human rights can be brought into full bloom on the fertile soil of democracy but only blood can be seen on the debris under dictatorship. This is just the reality in south Korea where the ill-famed "yusin" dictatorship is openly reviving.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group keen on conspiratorial racket in defamation of the inviolable human rights to escalate confrontation with compatriots is the group of worst criminals to be taken to justice before any others.
					
					 If it persists in escalating confrontation and brandishing the club of fascist dictatorship by abusing human rights, it will never be able to escape severe punishment by history and nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Rubbish Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Rubbish Blasted
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Unification Minister Ryu Kil Jae speaking before businessmen on Nov. 28 said that he is "concerned about the north making mention of the internal issue in south Korea and urged the DPRK "to stop abetting anti-'government' actions". What he meant was that south Koreans' anti-"government" actions were at the "instigation of the north".
					 Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary dismisses his remarks as sheer sophism, stressing that the chief executive and puppet group are architects prodding the south Koreans into actions against the "government".
					
					 Ryu's anti-DPRK rubbish just reflects the last-ditch efforts of those who are embarrassed by the actions of the people hitting their vulnerable point, the news analyst says, emphasizing that this is an intentional political provocation against the DPRK and an insult to the south Koreans.
					
					 Irony is that Ryu said he "exercised restraint for the development of the south-north relations even though there are a lot of things to mention about the inside situation of the north", the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 He is directly in charge of the issue of the north-south relations in south Korea. It does not mean that he is ignorant of the DPRK to speak out such disgusting rhetoric.
					
					 Turning to the "confidence-building process", Ryu said that this process calls for orientating toward the relations by which both sides trust each other even though they may hold dialogue and make exchanges and cooperation on a small-scale. This indicates the impudence of Ryu who can be admired even by those who earned ill fame in history as big liars.
					
					 To reflect on the successive Unification ministers of south Korea, no one was such a big political swindler as Ryu who is accustomed to making whopping lies.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Fostering Ideological Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Fostering Ideological Confrontation
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- At least 1 000 Buddhists of south Korea held a press conference at Jogye Temple, Seoul on Nov. 28 denouncing the puppet forces for raising the whirlwind of ideological confrontation.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the present regime of fostering extreme ideological confrontation by labeling forces opposed to its policy as "forces following the north".
					
					 The conservative group is taking an offensive act against Catholic religionists for holding a mass on the situation in demand of the resignation of the present chief executive, they charged.
					
					 They queried if the indifference to the people's living and creation of ideological contradiction are what the present regime touted as the great integrity of the people.
					
					 They said that the regime and the ruling party should probe the truth about the illegal act of power organs and repent of those acts before the people.
					
					 They demanded the authorities stop creating ideological confrontation and mend the relations with the north.

articles.title: Suppression of Protesters against Naval Base under Fire
articles.content:
Suppression of Protesters against Naval Base under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea released a statement on Nov. 27 denouncing the puppet authorities for suppressing protesters against the building of a naval base on Jeju Island.
					 There is continued crackdown on Kangjong villagers and peace activists who protest against the building of the base, the statement said.
					
					 650 persons have been walked away and more than 200 persons were put on trial since 2010 for the mere reason that they had been opposed to the building of the base, and fine levied on them amounts to hundreds of millions of won, they noted, and went on:
					
					 Shortly ago, the Jeju District Court inflicted heavy penalties on Kangjong villagers and peace activists, an apparent indication of human rights abuses.
					
					 The regime should halt the suppression of the activists and set free the detainees.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group's Reckless Remarks against DPRK Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group's Reckless Remarks against DPRK Condemned
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The representative of the south Korean "Saenuri Party" some days ago let loose strange remarks that the anti-"government" struggle has been intensified in south Korea after the north's recent release of the "order regarding struggle against the south" and it is necessary to be "cautious". Meanwhile, the spokesman for the south Korean Ministry of Unification said that it is very regretful that the north is set to cause social conflict and confusion while continuing slander, calumny and anti-"government" agitation, all the while urging the north to stop them at once.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a commentary which goes on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is trying to convince the public that the worst political confusion and ruling crisis created by itself were caused by the north. It is an insult to the south Korean people who rose for social progress and justice, and a hideous provocation against the north.
					
					 The anti-"government" struggle mounting in south Korea is a natural result caused by the treacherous crimes committed by the conservative ruling forces.
					
					 In the past the puppet group tried to tide over the crisis by engineering the conspiratorial case of a plotted rebellion. But it is now distorting facts to blame social confusion and conflict on the "north's agitation" in a bid to bring the situation under control and escape form the ruin.
					
					 The nonsensical rhetoric of the puppet group will draw only denunciation and derision of various circles in south Korea and will further touch off the anger of the people.
					
					 A saying goes curses come home to roost. If the group is justifying and further intensifying fascist suppression by taking issue with the DPRK, it will bring earlier its ruin.
					
					 The puppet conservative group who seized power through illegal election had better resign from the post of power as unanimously demanded by the people, not playing a cheap trick while groundlessly taking issue with the DPRK, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Assailed for Distorting History
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Assailed for Distorting History
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Nov. 28 carried an article denouncing the puppet conservative ruling forces for distorting history.
					 The history textbook written by scholars of the neo-conservative circle under the patronage of the Ministry of Education is now under examination, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The textbook whitewashes pro-Japanese dictatorship and distorts history. They should have been rejected from the screening stage by the "Committee for Compiling National History".
					
					 The textbook distorts the historical facts that the Japanese imperialists committed all sorts of evil acts to eliminate the Korean languages and letters and walked away 200 000 Koreans women to force them into sexual slavery and, at the same time, eulogizes such dictators as Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee. The screening of such textbook was possible because the Park Geun Hye regime had been deeply involved in it.
					
					 The article condemned the scholars of the neo-conservative circle appointed by the present regime to the seats of power for beautifying pro-Japanese dictatorship and spearheading a historical coup.
					
					 It said that even broad circles and local self-governing organizations of south Korea are demanding the nullification of the screening of the distorted history textbook.

articles.title: Actions for Checking Disbandment of Progressive Political Party Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Checking Disbandment of Progressive Political Party Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- At least 40 organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Progress and the Federation of Peasants Associations declared the inauguration of the All-People Movement Headquarters Opposing Disbandment of the Unified Progressive Party in Seoul on Nov. 27.
					 There took place a press conference on the inauguration that day.
					
					 At the press conference speakers said the request for judging the disbandment of the UPP is a horrible sign heralding the full-scale enforcement of the dictatorial politics and a springboard for laying a foundation for the forcible dissolution of all organizations.
					
					 If it is not checked, all people will become subject to suppression, they noted.
					
					 To check the disbandment of the UPP is to win democracy, they said, calling upon all people to turn out in the action to this end.

articles.title: U.S. Partition Policy Assailed by Newspaper of Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
U.S. Partition Policy Assailed by Newspaper of Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Nov. 26 carried an article laying bare the true colors of the U.S. which has fostered division and contradiction in south Korean society.
					 The article said that conservative media of south Korea is giving wide publicity to articles hurting the progressive forces.
					
					 The Intelligence Service is behind the conservative media and lurking behind this is the U.S. intervention and domination policy and, this is followed by the racket of Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" to label progressive forces as "forces following the north" and by the disgusting behavior of the conservative media, it noted.
					
					 The split and rule are the only means used by the U.S. to dominate the Korean Peninsula, it said.
					
					 The U.S. has enforced the domination policy in south Korea in such a way of putting forward its henchmen and replacing them with others and this led to the Park Geun Hye regime, it noted, and went on:
					
					 After taking office, the conservative group has left no means untried to undermine the Catholics by finding fault with a remark by a Catholic priest.
					
					 Moreover, it is working hard to do harm to and disband the Unified Progressive Party. The Intelligence Service and the backstage wirepuller U.S. have made every possible effort to prevent the progressive forces of south Korea from getting united.
					
					 All the progressive forces of south Korea should get united to struggle for independence, democracy and reunification. To this end, they should defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Flailed for Moving to Suppress Teachers Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Flailed for Moving to Suppress Teachers Union
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group of traitors is making desperate efforts to stamp out the Teachers Union.
					 Shortly ago, the puppet government deprived the union of its legitimate right, charging that it is granting membership to the teachers who were dismissed for calling for democracy against irregularities and corruption. City and provincial education agencies are taking legal actions against the union and there is continued crackdown on its members in different parts of south Korea.
					
					 The puppet authorities are contemplating sending back to schools at least 70 members who conducted full-time union activities.
					
					 The Jeju Provincial Education Agency dismissed the former senior vice-chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions from the post of teacher on the charge that he spearheaded the general strike of the organization against the import of American beef in 2008.
					
					 The Jonju District Prosecutor's Office arrested and indicted the former unification chairman of the North Jolla Provincial Branch of the union by invoking the ill-famed "Security Law".
					
					 The frantic suppression of the union is a heinous move to justify the revival of the fascist dictatorship and a blatant challenge to the ardent desire and aspiration of the south Korean people for democracy.
					
					 Very clear is the real intention of the Park Geun Hye group when it deprived the union of the legitimate right which the successive regimes had not done for the fear of the public opinion at home and abroad, and set in motion repressive mechanisms to put down the union.
					
					 The union is conducting brisk education activities to bring home to the rising generation the truth about the illegal election by the ruling forces, the reactionary essence of their anachronistic moves to distort history and the miserable aftermath caused by the "yusin" fascist dictatorship.
					
					 Unset by this, the puppet group is trying to remove the stumbling block lying in the way of maintaining power and trample down the democratic forces in south Korea to build the "yusin" dictatorial system.

articles.title: Lecture, Korean Film Show Held in Guinea
articles.content:
Lecture, Korean Film Show Held in Guinea 
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A lecture under the theme of "Leader who loves future" and a Korean film show took place at the Guinean Art College and at a hospital of Koloma District, Guinea on Nov. 12 and 19. 
					 At the event the head of the Fine Art Department of the Guinean Art College said: 
					
					 Supreme leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un enjoys deep trust from the international community now. 
					
					 A picture of him among the people with a sunny smile on his face fascinates the people.
					
					 In particular, people admire his special love for posterity. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's love for posterity is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un today. 
					
					 The international community sees rosy future of the DPRK in Kim Jong Un warmly loving children. 
					
					 Only victory and glory will always be in store for the Korean people dynamically advancing toward bright future under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A senior officer of the Guinean army said that he is greatly envious of the Korean people who have the invincible army and powerful arms and equipment capable of defeating any aggressors in the world.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people and other world progressives, prepared the Korean People's Army politically and ideologically and in military technique. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political and military power and space power in the world. His exploits will be immortal. 
					
					 Reunification of Korea and the building of a thriving socialist nation will surely be realized in the near future as long as Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean revolution. 
					
					 The Korean film "Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks" was shown in the film show.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Sweden
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Stockholm, Sweden on Nov. 23.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, Erik Anderson, international secretary of the Communist Party in Sweden, and the international secretary of the Communist Party of Sweden were elected co-chairmen of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and undying exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered by Regional Body
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated by the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on Nov. 23.
					 The international alliance made a decision on the inauguration of the committee. The decision said that the societies for the study of the Juche idea and Songun idea in East European and Central Asian Regions would organize colorful events including a remembrance meeting and a seminar on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the international alliance, was elected chairman of the committee, the decision said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Uganda 
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated with due ceremony in Kampala, Uganda on Nov. 21. 
					 Present at the ceremony were personages of the Ugandan government, political parties, organizations and regional bodies. 
					
					 The department director of the Presidency of Uganda was elected chairman of the committee. 
					
					 The director expressed the will to actively launch colorful political and cultural events in praise of the exploits of Kim Jong Il to mark the second anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Uganda 
						
 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The department director of the Presidency of Uganda said at the inaugural ceremony of the committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il on Nov. 21 that Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, thus making great contributions to implementing the human cause of independence. 
					 He added that the Korean people are achieving big successes in building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita unidad 991 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas con motivo del Dia de Aviacion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita unidad 991 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas con motivo del Dia de Aviacion
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la Unidad 991 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, laureada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup, y felicito a los oficiales y soldados por el Dia de Aviacion.
					Le recibieron los comandantes de la unidad.
					
					Tras estrechar manos con cada uno de ellos, el felicito calidamente a los militares que celebran el Dia de Aviacion.
					
					Acto seguido, sostuvo conversaciones con los uniformados de la unidad.
					
					Recordo que los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il realizaron ingentes esfuerzos por fortalecer las fuerzas aereas como filas de combate de flor y nata y dispensaron a los pilotos todos los favores y benevolencias posibles apreciandolos mas que nadie.
					
					Nuestra aviacion es valioso patrimonio revolucionario dejado por los Generalisimos, dijo y agrego que sus proezas acumuladas en la construccion de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas brillaran siempre en la historia de construccion del ejercito tipo Juche.
					
					Gracias a las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas crecidas en el regazo de los Generalisimos, el EPC es invencible y la patria socialista se mantiene inexpugnable, apunto.
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los militares de la unidad se mantendran en la perfecta disposicion de combate y defenderan con firmeza la patria socialista que avanza hacia la victoria final, el Mariscal se fotografio con los uniformados de la unidad.
					
					El fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Kim Yong Chol, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Hwang Pyong So.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de batalla revolucionaria de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de batalla revolucionaria de Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el campo de batalla revolucionaria de Samjiyon.
					El estuvo primero en el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon.
					
					Paso revista a la estatua de bronce que describe al Presidente Kim Il Sung de aquel dia en que emprendio en uniforme militar el camino de avance a la patria durante la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa y al conjunto de esculturas de los militares del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea y otros habitantes.
					
					Dijo que el conjunto monumental levantado por la iniciativa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il resulta una escena epica que demuestra, mediante profunda descripcion ideo-artistica, las proezas imborrables del Presidente, quien condujo a la victoria la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa, y la justeza de la causa revolucionaria del Juche. 
					
					Este museo al aire libre es tan pintoresco y espectacular, expreso.
					
					Recorriendo este lugar, patrimonio eterno de la revolucion coreana y base de educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias, redoblo la decision y voluntad de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, iniciada en el monte Paektu, apunto.
					
					Evaluo altamente a los funcionarios y empleados del campo que trabajan con toda sinceridad y fidelidad para el mantenimiento y cuidado de monumentos.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal visito el campamento para los visitantes al campo de batalla revolucionaria de Samjiyon.
					
					Pasando por varios puntos como el edificio no.1 y el comedor para los estudiantes visitantes, se cercioro del estado de servicios en el vivaque y de la programacion de la jornada de los visitantes.
					
					Propuso acondicionar mejor a las alturas del nuevo siglo el interior del campamento como alojamiento de los que recorren el lugar de batalla revolucionaria y tomo las medidas para el particular.
					
					Instruyo que las organizaciones del partido y las entidades de masas deben profundizar la educacion a traves del recorrido a los lugares de batalla revolucionaria y de interes historico-revolucionario para que en ese curso asimilen en carne propia la idea revolucionaria y las hazanas inmortales de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Hay que organizar bien el recorrido combinando la visita periodica y la normal, enseno.
					
					El recorrido por esos lugares deviene una labor muy importante que debe continuar firmemente hasta que nuestra revolucion logre la victoria final, dijo.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios de la rama interesada cumpliran con su honrosa mision y deber.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Kim Pyong Ho, Hong Yong Chil y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige labores de varios dominios de distrito de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige labores de varios dominios de distrito de Samjiyon
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de varios dominios del distrito de Samjiyon.
					El Mariscal visito el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Samjiyon.
					
					Paso revista a la sala de presentacion del historial y las de grupos de musica vocal, fisica, carros, etc.
					
					Dijo que el palacio es el de los ninos a quienes amaban tanto el Presidente y el Dirigente y dio las instrucciones valiosas para conservar mas claros y atentos los retratos de los Generalisimos con amplias sonrisas. 
					
					Dado que en Samjiyon viene rapido el invierno, es necesario tomar las medidas para garantizar la temperatura del interior del palacio para que los ninos escolares sigan sus actividades aun en la estacion invernal, dijo y  agrego que deben resolver el problema de aseguramiento de temperatura al aplicar el  sistema de calefaccion geotermica.
					
					En la sala de deportes dio instrucciones de resolver el problema de iluminacion que permitira el entrenamiento nocturno e instalar mejor los equipos deportivos tales como el de  baloncesto.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal estuvo en el Restaurante de Fideos Pegaebong.
					
					Recorriendo varias salas de comida de los primer y segundo pisos, se entero en detalles del ambiente interior y exterior del restaurante y del estado de su servicio.
					
					Para gestionar mejor el restaurante donde estan registradas las proezas de guia del Dirigente, no deben imitar a los ajenos, sino dar destaque a las peculiaridades de su localidad, dijo y agrego que es importante tomar las medidas para suministrar suficientemente las materias primas como almidon y carne.
					
					El Mariscal visito la Casa Cultural de Samjiyon.
					
					Tras averiguar detalladamente el estado de administracion de la casa cultural y de la vida cultural de los habitantes distritales, el Mariscal refirio la necesidad de mejorar incesantemente la administracion de la casa cultural.
					
					Al recorrer la cancha de jockey bajo techo, el de patinaje al aire libre y la pista de esqui de la villa deportiva en la zona del monte Paektu  insistio en modernizarla. 
					
					El Mariscal vio el entrenamiento de los jugadores de esqui del Conjunto Deportivo Sajabong.
					
					Antes del inicio de entrenamiento, llamo a los jugadores y les pregunto desde cuando aprendieron el esqui y vio en detalles sus uniformes.
					
					Al cabo de recorrer el distrito, el Mariscal presento las tareas programaticas.
					
					Apunto que el partido tiene la firme decision para que suenen mas altas las voces de vivas del socialismo y del PTC desde en Samjiyon, primera aldea al pie del Paektu, monte sagrado de la revolucion y origen de la revolucion coreana. 
					
					El centro, la provincia y todo el pais deben apoyar activamente para que todos los militantes del partido y trabajadores del distrito se armen con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y glorifiquen las tradiciones revolucionarias de nuestro partido, apunto.
					
					Prometio venir otra vez al distrito de Samjiyon diciendo que el mismo piensa siempre en los habitantes del distrito que viven cerca del Paektu, monte sagrado de la revolucion.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por Kim Won Hong, Kim Yang Gon, Han Kwang Sang, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So, Kim Pyong Ho, Hong Yong Chil y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Informacion de ACNC
articles.content:
Informacion de ACNC

					
						 
					Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico el dia 30 la siguiente informacion: 
					Hace poco, un organo competente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea retuvo al ciudadano estadounidense, Merrill Edward Newman, quien entro en el pais en condicion de turista y cometio actos hostiles.
					
					Aunque entro en octubre pasado en la RPDC integrando un grupo de turistas, el realizo actos enajenados del turismo como los de violar la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC y censurar el regimen socialista de esta.
					
					Ademas, intento buscar a los espias y terroristas, que cometian el espionaje y sabotaje durante la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953) en la zona del monte Kuwol, y a sus familiares para conectarlos con la Asociacion de Companeros de Armas Guerrilleros de Kuwol, organizacion surcoreana de complots anti-RPDC.
					
					Segun el resultado de investigacion del organo competente, Merrill Edward Newman, trabajo desde principios de 1953 como asesor de la "Unidad Kuwol" del 6o Regimiento Guerrillero de Corea de la ONU, adscrito al Buro de Inteligencia de la Comandancia del Extremo Oriente de EE.UU.
					
					Se ha probado claramente que en aquel entonces, ese criminal organizo y dirigio directamente las actividades de espionaje y sabotaje anti-RPDC y en ese curso, asesino cruelmente a los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea e inocentes habitantes.
					
					Sus acciones hostiles a la RPDC han sido confirmadas con varias pruebas materiales.
					
					Newman reconocio todos sus delitos y pidio disculpas.

articles.title: Nota de disculpa de Merrill Newman
articles.content:
Nota de disculpa de Merrill Newman
						

					
						 
					Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Abajo sigue la nota de disculpa que ha entregado el retenido ciudadano norteamericano Merrill Edward Newman a un organo competente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea:
					
					Soy Merrill Newman que vive en California de Estados Unidos.
					Durante la Guerra Coreana, he sido culpable de una larga lista de indelebles crimenes contra el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el pueblo coreano como asesor de la "Unidad Kuwol" del 6o Regimiento Guerrillero de Corea de la ONU, adscrito al Buro de Inteligencia de la Comandancia del Extremo Oriente de EE.UU.
					
					He impartido la educacion militar y el entrenamiento de guerrilla a 300 personas que fueron al Sur de Corea tras cometer barbaridades y tenian resentimiento de la RPDC, para que ellas atacaran despues a la RPDC aun despues de la firma de armisticio.
					
					Despachando a algunos elementos al area de la provincia de Hwanghae, he dado tambien a 200 soldados bajo mi mando la mision de perturbar la base de retaguardia, especificamente, recoger las informaciones sobre el movimiento y el equipamiento armado del Ejercito Popular de Corea, atacar y destruir el sistema de comunicaciones, los depositos de arroz, el ferrocarril y los trenes de municiones.
					
					A mis ordenes, ellos recogieron informaciones sobre el EPC y atacaron el sistema de comunicaciones matando a 3 operadoras inocentes, dilataron el suministro de municiones usando explosivos obtenidos del asalto a minas y atacaron a los militares del EPC y realizaron 10 veces la operacion de perturbacion de retaguardia en el area de la Provincia de Hwanghae.
					
					Ellos mataron alrededor de 50 soldados en el proceso de la operacion. Creo que en el proceso de cumplimiento de mis posteriores ordenes, ellos habran matado a mas personas inocentes.
					
					Ya que mate a muchos civiles y soldados del EPC y destrui los objetos estrategicos de la RPDC durante la Guerra Coreana, cometi indelebles actos ofensivos contra el gobierno de la RPDC y el pueblo coreano.
					
					Si bien pasaron 60 anos, vine a la RPDC el 17 de octubre de 2013 con el pretexto de turismo como un miembro del 33 grupo turistico de EE.UU.
					
					Descaradamente, tuve un plan de reunirme con algunos soldados sobrevivientes y orar por el alma de los muertos en el monte Kuwol durante la Guerra Coreana.
					
					En el itinerario, pedi a mi guia que me ayudara a encontrar a los soldados sobrevivientes y sus familiares y descendientes porque eso fue muy dificil para hacer yo solo.
					
					Quise orar por el alma de los soldados muertos si yo tuviera la oportunidad de visitar el monte Kuwol. Si me reuniera con los soldados sobrevivientes en el monte Kuwol, iba a conectarlos con los miembros de la Asociacion de Companeros de Armas Guerrilleros de Kuwol, organizacion de complot estrategico anticomunista con la que ya tuve contactos.
					
					Todos los miembros de la Asociacion de Companeros de Armas Guerrilleros de Kuwol escaparon de la RPDC al Sur de Corea. Por eso, pedi al guia que me ayudara a buscar a las familias de ellos y los relacionados que viven en la RPDC y entregue al guia el documento escrito con las direcciones y correos electronicos de ellos en el Hotel Yanggakdo.
					
					He traido tambien en esta visita los libros electronicos criticando a la RPDC socialista y la he criticado.
					
					Aunque cometi indelebles actos ofensivos contra el pueblo coreano en el periodo de la Guerra Coreana, volvi a ser culpable de grandes crimenes contra el gobierno de la RPDC y el pueblo coreano.
					
					Reconozco que no puedo ser perdonado por mis actos ofensivos, pero pido el perdon de rodillas arrepintiendome sinceramente de mis ofensivas contra el gobierno de la RPDC y el pueblo coreano y quiero que no me castiguen.
					
					Perdonenme por favor.
					
					No voy a cometer nunca mas los actos ofensivos contra el gobierno de la RPDC y el pueblo coreano.
					
					En esta visita, pude comprender que en EE.UU. y los paises occidentales se hace una desinformacion sobre la RPDC.
					
					Si yo regreso a EE.UU., voy a contar los aspectos verdaderos de la RPDC y la vida que lleva el pueblo coreano.
					
					Merrill Newman 9 de noviembre de 2013.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRC denuncia represion contra entidad religiosa en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRC denuncia represion contra entidad religiosa en Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Religiosos de Corea (CRC) publico el dia 29 una declaracion senalando que ahora la banda de conservadores surcoreanos libra la "caza de brujas de version moderna" censurando hasta la misa de situacion del Cuerpo Nacional de Sacerdotes Catolicos por la Realizacion de la Justicia como accion "pro-Norte" (de Corea).
					El documento adelanta que la purga de fuerzas "pro-Norte" no puede ser la receta universal para eludir la extremada crisis de gobernacion y prosigue:
					
					La horda de restos de la dictadura de "Yusin" (renovacion) levanta la ola de fascismo vinculando por la fuerza con la RPDC la demanda y la lucha justas del mencionado cuerpo religioso.
					
					Todos los surcoreanos reconocen que las "elecciones presidenciales" celebradas en el ano pasado fueron las fraudulentas en que se habian movilizado todos los aparatos del poder para favorecer la eleccion de la actual mandataria. Durante 6 meses pasados, no paro ni un dia la manifestacion con velas encendidas de los habitantes que resisten al poder de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Un punado de gobernantes como Chongwadae y el "Partido Saenuri" estan desoyendo tal clamor de protestas del pueblo surcoreano.
					
					Es muy justo que los religiosos, partidarios de la justa opinion publica, hayan condenado el mal social.
					
					En la decada de 1970 cuando se practicaba en el territorio surcoreano la mas brutal dictadura fascista de "Yusin", las iglesias servian de escenarios de lucha por la democratizacion de la sociedad y los sacerdotes de dicho cuerpo y otros religiosos se sumaron al torrente de la lucha antidictatorial.
					
					Esta tradicion de lucha continua en la actualidad en que renace la dictadura de "Yusin" y cuenta con el apoyo total de los habitantes de conciencia de diferentes sectores.
					
					Las bestias, que bloquean el progreso social y tratan de mantener su precaria vida desafiando a la voluntad del pueblo y recurriendo a la injusticia, seran condenadas y castigadas duro por el pueblo.
					
					Como compatriotas y colegas, apoyaremos la lucha justa de los religiosos y sus entidades, inclusive el cuerpo arriba mencionado.
					
					El CRC esta convencido de que las organizaciones y entidades religiosas y los religiosos del mundo enviaran el apoyo total y solidaridad a los religiosos surcoreanos que se rebelaron contra la injusticia.

articles.title: Delegado coreano rechaza espionaje electronico de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Delegado coreano rechaza espionaje electronico de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En la reunion del 3o comite del 68o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio discurso en apoyo a la resolucion intitulado "Derecho a la vida privada en la epoca de IT", presentada por Brasil y Alemania frente a la interceptacion ilegal de Estados Unidos. 
					La resolucion fue presentada en el tiempo muy apropiado en la escena internacional, dijo y agrego que el espionaje electronico de un estado especifico contra el mundo entero nos da gran impacto por su caracter y gravedad y la presente resolucion refleja precisamente la opinion publica de la sociedad internacional.
					
					El presento los siguientes temas de principios:
					
					Primero, no hay que permitir mas en las relaciones internacionales el acto violatorio al respeto a la soberania y los principios de no intervencion en los asuntos interiores.
					
					La interceptacion ilegal sobre los lideres estatales es precisamente la violacion a la soberania estatal y la intervencion en los asuntos internos de los estados soberanos, lo que constituye un insoportable insulto a la dignidad del estado y la violacion flagrante a las Cartas de la ONU.
					
					Hay que poner inmediato fin a tal espionaje electronico del pais norteamericano. Al margen de esto no se puede imaginar ni asegurar la  proteccion y la promocion de verdaderos derechos humanos, las relaciones basadas en la confianza y la cooperacion entre los paises y de la paz y la estabilidad internacionales.
					
					Segundo, hay que proteger estrictamente el derecho a la vida privada.
					
					El espionaje electronico demuestra que EE.UU. es un pais violador de DDHH de pesima calana que no observa ni siquiera la nocion basica de DDHH.
					
					En vez de censurar el estado de DDHH de otros paises, EE.UU. debe poner inmediato fin a sus indiscriminados actos violadores de DDHH.
					
					Hay que tomar urgentemente las medidas eficientes para acabar con tales actos violadores  de DDHH de EE.UU.
					
					La RPDC se ha hecho copromotor de la citada resolucion sometida a la presente sesion.
